alert.note: Alert for Dunklin (Missouri) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued March 24 at 12:02PM CDT until March 28 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Arkansas...Missouri... Saint Francis River near Saint Francis For the Saint Francis River...including Saint Francis...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM SATURDAY MORNING TO TUESDAY EVENING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Saint Francis River near Saint Francis. * WHEN...From Saturday morning to Tuesday evening. * IMPACTS...At 23.0 feet, Most lowland inside the levee system is flooded. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 11:00 AM CDT Friday the stage was 17.5 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage late tomorrow morning to a crest of 23.5 feet Sunday morning. It will then fall below flood stage Monday evening. - Flood stage is 22.0 feet. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood &&
info.instruction: Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at weather.gov/memphis. The next statement will be issued as conditions warrant.
